image.altText: Children collect water from a truck using plastic jugs and jerry cans.

props.synopsis: A water desalination plant in central Gaza, which had been repaired just a few months ago, is now without power after Israel switched off supply to the strip.

image.altText: A group of men in combat gear stand in rubble

props.synopsis: The Israeli government has rejected the findings of the UN report, which accused it of using "genocidal acts" and sexual violence as a war strategy in Gaza.

image.altText: A US influencer holding a joey wombat that is in distress with its mouth open

image.altText: A diptych compiling three screenshots showing extensive damage at a social housing estate.

title.children: F1 Australian Grand Prix: How to watch and what time the race starts

image.altText: CCTV showing a small crocodile running from a man.
